A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: JJ Abrams strikes again\, as producer this time\, presenting this Star Wars story once more in the only style he knows how: stringing us as audiences and fans along... all the while making you believe you are being led somewhere. But in the end you always find that the reality is you haven't been taken anywhere. The story has told you nothing. And you are required to believe\, once again\, that all your hopes and questions will be realized in the next installment.
